tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE body_mechanics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sport_equipment_id UUID,
  athlete_id UUID,
  force_applied DECIMAL,
  angle DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ImpactRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    mechanics_id INT,
    impact_level DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES SportsEquipment(equipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mechanics_id) REFERENCES BodyMechanics(mechanics_id)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_data (
	impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	athlete_id INT NOT NULL,
	equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
	mechanics_id INT NOT NULL,
	impact_date DATE NOT NULL,
	impact_reading FLOAT NOT NULL
);
